attributes.action: Pass legislation that regulates the selling of entertainment tickets
attributes.background: Many have experienced frustration at not being able to purchase entertainment tickets. Most have already been allocated or sold already in presales, before the general public get a chance. This means most end up paying extortionate prices on reselling sites. This is unfair and should be regulated.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what specific changes you would like Parliament to make to the law.
